name: Return of the Fallen One
description:
The first mission of Return of the Fallen One. A campaign with several features and will hopefully be a success. This campaign is canon of the Starcraft series, and takes place in between Wings of Liberty and Heart of the Swarm. The release date is still unsure, but will most likely be released within the next 2 weeks.

Features: -2 player co-op -A hero for each player -No production structures (except the Requisition Base)

Plot: Chris and Jonathan, two mercenaries who are apart of Andrew's Elite, have finished their mission on Char. Now they must get back to their ship before it leaves without them. Yet strange forces are at work, leaving Chris and Jonathan what is really happening in the Koprulu Sector.
